title: Team Page Header Icon
custom_steps: When the user navs to the team's team page
custom_expected: Then the team page header icon will be updated

title: Team Page Snapshot Logo
custom_preconds:
Given a team is rebranding
and the team page's top schedule snapshot is enabled
custom_steps:
When the user navs to the team's page
and views a matchup in the top schedule snapshot
custom_expected: Then the team logo will be updated

title: Team Page Insider
custom_steps:
When the user navs to the team's page
and views the Insider section
custom_expected: Then the team's name and images will reflect the rebrand

title: Team Page - Team Insider
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the team's page
and scrolls down to the [team] Insider section
custom_expected: Then the team name will be updated to the rebrand

title: Team Page - Team Info
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the team's page
and scrolls down to the [team] Info section
custom_expected: Then the team name will be updated to the rebrand

title: Team Page - More from
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the team's page
and scrolls down to "More from the [team]" section
custom_expected: Then the team name will be updated to the rebrand

title: Team Page Watermark
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the team's page
and scrolls down to the watermark
custom_expected: Then the watermark will be updated to the new logo

title: Team Page Tab Bar - Selected
custom_steps:
When the user has set the rebranded team as their favorite team
and views the tab bar while on the team page
custom_expected: Then the team's logo and name will be updated properly

title: Team Page Tab Bar - Not Selected
custom_steps:
When the user has set the rebranded team as their favorite team
and views the tab bar while on another tab (not the team page)
custom_expected: Then the team's logo and name will be updated properly

title: Scoreboard
custom_steps:
When the user navs to the Scoreboard
to a date where the team is playing
custom_expected: Then the team's game cell will include the updated team logo and name

title: Game Stories Matchup Image
custom_preconds:
Given a team is rebranding
and there is a live or final game with the team available in the schedule
custom_steps:
When the user is on the Scoreboard
and is viewing the team's matchup
and expands that game cell
and views the Game Stories link
custom_expected: Then the Game Stories matchup image will display the rebranded team logo

title: Gameday Preview Matchup Image
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing the Scoreboard on a date where the team has a game scheduled
and taps on that game cell to open Gameday Preview
custom_expected: Then the team's updated logo will appear in the matchup image

title: Gameday > Preview - Cap Logo
custom_preconds:
Given a team is rebranding
and the team has a game in preview
custom_steps: When the user launches Gameday Preview of the rebranded team
custom_expected: Then the team's cap logo will be properly updated in the Preview page

title: Gameday > Wrap - Cap Logo
custom_preconds:
Given a team is rebranding
and the team has a game in Final
custom_steps: When the user launches Gameday > Wrap of the final game of the rebranded team
custom_expected: Then the team's cap logo will be properly updated in the Wrap tab

title: Gameday > Summary - Cap Logo
custom_preconds:
Given a team is rebranding
and the team has a live or in progress game
custom_steps: When the user launches Gameday > Summary tab of the rebranded team
custom_expected: Then the team's cap logo will be properly updated throughout the Scoring and All Plays tabs

title: Gameday Stadium Image
custom_steps:
When the rebranded team is currently in a live/in progress game
and the user launches Gameday Live
custom_expected: Then the rebranded background stadium image will appear

title: Gameday Uniforms
custom_preconds:
Given a team is rebranding
and the team has a live game
custom_steps:
When the user has launched Gameday for the rebranded team's live game
and is viewing the batter images
custom_expected: Then the rebranded logo and name will appear on the batter uniforms

title: Stats Filter
custom_steps:
When the user is on the Stats tab
and launches the team filter
custom_expected: Then the rebranded team's logo will correctly appear next to the team name

title: MLB.TV EPG Logo
custom_preconds:
Given a team is rebranding
and the rebranded team has a live or archive TV feed available
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the MLB.TV EPG on the day where the rebranded team has a TV feed
custom_expected: Then the game cell will correctly show the rebranded logo and team name

title: Primary Team Link Colors
custom_steps:
When the user has set the rebranded team as their favorite team
and is navigating throughout the app
custom_expected: Then the link colors will properly reflect the rebranded team's colors

title: Team Picker Logo - News
custom_steps:
When the user is on the News tab
and launches the team picker
custom_expected: Then the rebranded team's logo and name will appear

title: Team Picker Logo - Videos
custom_steps:
When the user is on the Videos tab
and launches the team picker
custom_expected: Then the rebranded team's logo and name will appear

title: Team Picker Logo - Team Page
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing a team page
and launches the team picker
custom_expected: Then the rebranded team's logo and name will appear

title: Team Picker Logo - Settings
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the My Teams section of Account Settings
custom_expected: Then the rebranded team's logo and name will appear

title: Team Picker Logo - Settings/Notifications
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the Notifications section of Account Settings
custom_expected: Then the rebranded team's logo and name will appear

title: Team Picker Logo - Settings/Home Screen Icon
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the Home Screen Icon section of Account Settings
custom_expected: Then the rebranded team's logo and name will appear

title: Team Picker Logo - Home Screen Icon
custom_steps:
When the user has selected the rebranded team's logo as their home screen icon
and is viewing the home screen
custom_expected: Then the rebranded team's logo will appear as the home screen icon

title: Team Picker Logo - Onboarding
custom_preconds:
Given a team is rebranding
and the user fresh installs the app
custom_steps:
When the user is going through onboarding
and is viewing the favorite/followed team picker
custom_expected: Then the rebranded team's logo and name will appear

title: Team Picker Logo - Onboarding/Notifications
custom_preconds:
Given a team is rebranding
and the user fresh installs the app
custom_steps:
When the user is going through onboarding
and is viewing the notifications settings
custom_expected: Then the rebranded team's logo and name will appear

title: Chromecast Matchup Image
custom_preconds:
Given a team is rebranding
and the user's device is connected to the same wifi as a Chromecast device
and the rebranded team has a live or archive TV feed available
custom_steps:
When the user successfully connects the app to the Chromecast
and launches the rebranded team's TV feed
custom_expected: Then the rebranded team logo will appear in the Chromecast matchup image

title: CarPlay Image
custom_preconds:
Given a team is rebranding
and is able to connect the device to CarPlay
and the rebranded team has an audio feed available
custom_steps:
When the user conencts to CarPlay
and views the audio options
custom_expected: Then the rebranded team's logo will correctly display in the CarPlay interface

title: Watch Logo - Scores
custom_preconds:
Given a team is rebranding
and the user has a watch that is synced to the device
and has the app installed
and the rebranded team has a game scheduled
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the Scores tab on the watch
custom_expected: Then the rebranded team's logo will correctly display on the watch

title: Watch Logo - Complication
custom_preconds:
Given a team is rebranding
and the user has a watch that is synced to the device
and has the app installed
and the rebranded team has a game scheduled
and the rebranded team has been set as the favorite team
custom_steps: When the user has added the MLB app complication to the device
custom_expected: Then the rebranded team's logo will correctly display on the watch complication

title: Watch Logo - Standings
custom_preconds:
Given a team is rebranding
and the user has a watch that is synced to the device
and has the app installed
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the Standings tab on the watch
custom_expected: Then the rebranded team's logo will correctly display on the watch
